LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleDarkGreen.label: turtle dark green skin
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleDarkGreen.description: Carriers of this gene produce a pigment that turns their skin a turtle dark green color.
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleLightGreen.label: turtle light green skin
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleLightGreen.description: Carriers of this gene produce a pigment that turns their skin a turtle light green color.
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleBlue.label: turtle blue skin
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleBlue.description: Carriers of this gene produce a pigment that turns their skin a turtle blue color.
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleDarkBrown.label: turtle dark brown skin
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleDarkBrown.description: Carriers of this gene produce a pigment that turns their skin a turtle dark brown color.
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleLightBrown.label: turtle light brown skin
LanguageData.OE_Skin_TurtleLightBrown.description: Carriers of this gene produce a pigment that turns their skin a turtle light brown color.
LanguageData.OE_TortleHead.label: tortle head
LanguageData.OE_TortleHead.description: Carriers of this gene has a tortle head.
LanguageData.OE_TortleFingers.label: tortle fingers
LanguageData.OE_TortleFingers.description: Tortle rough fingers improve work with medical instruments. But it's difficult to work with ranged weapon.
LanguageData.OE_TortleShell.label: tortle shell
LanguageData.OE_TortleShell.description: Carriers of this gene have tortle shell. This is a very strong shell that significantly reduces taken damage, allows to carry much more weight, but makes it difficult and slow to move.
LanguageData.OE_Wisdom.label: wisdom of generations
LanguageData.OE_Wisdom.description: Carriers of this gene has the knowledge of past generations and a huge potential for learning. There is also an opportunity to inspire others by revealing to them wisdom from the past.
LanguageData.OE_Hair_TurtleDarkGreen.label: turtle dark green hair
LanguageData.OE_Hair_TurtleLightGreen.label: turtle light green hair
LanguageData.OE_Hair_TurtleBlue.label: turtle blue hair
LanguageData.OE_Hair_TurtleDarkBrown.label: turtle dark brown hair
LanguageData.OE_Hair_TurtleLightBrown.label: turtle light brown hair
